protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the decomposition of L-selenocysteine to L-alanine and elemental selenium (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Mihara H, Kurihara T, Watanabe T, Yoshimura T, Esaki N: cDNA cloning, purification, and characterization of mouse liver selenocysteine lyase. Candidate for selenium delivery protein in selenoprotein synthesis. J Biol Chem. 2000 Mar 3;275(9):6195-200.
